Just an example of the use of `create_dataset` for now. Not working at the moment (or well very slowly).

```{r}
library("datasauRus")
df <- datasauRus::datasaurus_dozen[datasauRus::datasaurus_dozen$dataset == "star",]
target_df <- datasauRus::datasaurus_dozen[datasauRus::datasaurus_dozen$dataset == "dino",]

created_df <- datasauRus::create_dataset(df, target_df,
                                         iters = 20000)

```

Plot results

```{r}
df$source <- "start"
target_df$source <- "target"
created_df$source <- "created"
all_df <- rbind(df, target_df, created_df)
library("ggplot2")
ggplot(all_df) +
  geom_point(aes(x, y, col = source)) +
  theme_minimal()

```
